products.name: CATE RIGID BAG
products.description: Designed for the modern woman, the Cate Rigid Bag features a sleek and structured silhouette that exudes confidence and refinement. The rigid exterior provides durability and ensures that the bag maintains its shape, while the smooth and luxurious finish adds a touch of glamour.

products.name: GUESS CONNECT WATCH
products.description: Featuring a sleek and contemporary design, the Guess Connect Watch is crafted with premium materials, ensuring durability and a refined aesthetic. The watch face showcases a sophisticated display with easy-to-read dials, giving you quick access to essential information at a glance.

products.name: '70s RETRO GLAM KEFIAH
products.description: The 70s Retro Glam Kefiah features a vibrant and intricate pattern, reminiscent of the bohemian and psychedelic designs that defined the era. The rich colors and geometric motifs create a statement piece that adds a pop of personality to any outfit.
